channel.title: NPC Range, Trouble [Halp :S]
channel.description:
Alright I don't know how to make an NPC support range. But I decided to mess around on NPCHanlder.java to see if it works..
I got the NPC doing the Range Emote and the Arrow Gfx, although the arrow comes in my body and the npc doesn't face me. Here is a pic
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2ytwhu1.jpg[/img]
Ok and here is the code I used (newbie newbie I know that's why I need help)
[code] else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2361) {//Elf Warrior npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 426; gfxAll(25, EnemyY, EnemyX); }[/code]
Now if you could help me fix this ;) rep++ ;D

item.title: NPC Range, Trouble [Halp :S]

Alright I don’t know how to make an NPC support range.
But I decided to mess around on NPCHanlder.java to see if it works…

I got the NPC doing the Range Emote and the Arrow Gfx, although the arrow comes in my body and the npc doesn’t face me. Here is a pic

Ok and here is the code I used (newbie newbie I know that’s why I need help)

else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2361) {//Elf Warrior npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 426; gfxAll(25, EnemyY, EnemyX); }

Now if you could help me fix this
